sections.title: Foundational Synthesis - Value Chain Position and Silicon Economics
required_elements: Value chain classification and control vs dependency map
Durability of controlled layers and fragility of dependent layers
Leadership pedigree and insider alignment assessment
Board semiconductor domain expertise assessment

sections.title: Silicon Economics - Wafer-to-Revenue Bridge
required_elements: Process node and foundry dependency by major product
Advanced packaging and HBM dependency analysis
ASP trajectory and pricing power framework
Design win momentum and revenue visibility analysis
Gross margin bridge decomposition (wafer cost, yield, mix, utilization)

sections.title: Ecosystem and Competitive Moat Analysis
required_elements: Software ecosystem lock-in and switching cost analysis
Substitution economics by customer segment
Full-stack vs point-solution stack depth map

sections.title: Financial Logic and Valuation
required_elements: Revenue decomposition by segment and concentration risk
Cash generation mechanics by business model
Stage-appropriate valuation framework and DCF sensitivity
Capital return and balance sheet assessment

sections.title: Supply Chain Risk Architecture
required_elements: Foundry concentration and disruption scenario impact
Advanced packaging bottleneck assessment
HBM or memory supply risk assessment
Geopolitical and export control exposure mapping

sections.title: Product Roadmap and Technology Cadence
required_elements: Three-generation architecture roadmap with cadence
Training vs inference product positioning and margin implications
Networking/interconnect strategy and competitive position

sections.title: Pattern Matching and IDP Flagging
required_elements: Interesting Data Points (IDPs) callouts with explanation
Narrative vs empirical divergence checks

sections.title: High-Agency Investigation Tracks
required_elements: Three investigation tracks with explicit hypotheses
Alpha rationale for each track
Exact data or expert inputs required to resolve each hypothesis

structural_requirements: Report has markdown headings for all required sections
Interesting Data Points (IDPs) are explicitly labeled
High-Agency Investigation Tracks section present with 3 tracks
notes: This index is a compliance-oriented extraction, not a replacement for full playbook depth in report generation.
